project1.title: The Number Guessing Game
project1.description: A console based number guessing game that prompts a player to choose a number between a specified range of numbers.

project2.title: Basketball Stats Tool
project2.description: A console based basketball team statistics tool to help divide up a group of players into equal teams.
skills: Creating control flow using for loops and conditional statements

project3.title: Phrase Hunters
project3.description: A console based word guessing game which hides a random phrase from player and they try to guess within a certain amount of guesses.
skills: Adding methods and attributes to a class

project4.title: Store Inventory with SQLAlchemy
project4.description: A console application that loads an existing store's inventory from a CSV file into a SQLite database. CRUD operations implemented.
